title: Energy Quantum Meetup
description: Join us for an engaging meetup exploring the latest developments in quantum computing and energy solutions. Network with innovators, researchers, and enthusiasts working at the intersection of quantum technology and sustainable energy.

title: Hakathon 2024
description: A collaborative hackathon bringing together developers, designers, and innovators to build creative solutions and breakthrough projects. Compete, learn, and connect with the tech community in an intensive coding event.

title: Road2 Meetup
description: Connect with startups at the forefront of quantum computing innovation. This meetup brings together founders, investors, and tech enthusiasts to explore groundbreaking quantum technologies and discuss the future of the industry.
